items.sentence: I almost wish that I were going to Boston with you.
I wanted to see if you\'d heard anything about Tom.
Oh, sorry, I didn\'t know it was against the rules.
Neither Tom nor Mary has been helping us with that.
Tom seems to be having a little difficulty in math.
Tom never told Mary about what he did that weekend.
Tom never told me that he knew how to speak French.
Tom occasionally visited me when I lived in Boston.
Tom already knows that Mary is planning to do that.
Tom decided that he didn\'t really like doing that.
Tom doesn\'t speak French well and I don\'t either.
My stomach aches so much that I can\'t fall asleep.
Is this how you want to live the rest of your life?
Is your French good enough to explain how to do it?
It might be very hard for me to be alone right now.
Are there any girls here that you haven\'t met yet?
Tom asked Mary if she knew who John was married to.
Tom was about to be killed, but he didn\'t know it.
I don\'t think that Tom knows who did that for him.
I don\'t think that the police will ever catch Tom.
